Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | Romance/Dating
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)

Lip Service is a story of sex, lies and true love in modern Scotland which follows the lives of some 20-something lesbians. Photographer Frankie returns to Glasgow for the funeral of her beloved aunt after having spent the last two years in America having run away from her relationship with Cat, her family and herself.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Lip_Service)
